author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Foraco International Reports Q4 Revenue $35 Mln
text:
March 5 (Reuters) - Foraco International Sa:
* FORACO INTERNATIONAL REPORTS Q4 2017 * ‍Q4 2017 REVENUE AMOUNTED TO US$ 35.0 MILLION COMPARED TO US$ 28.7 MILLION IN Q4 2016​
* ‍AS AT DECEMBER 31, 2017, COMPANY’S ORDER BACKLOG FOR CONTINUING OPERATIONS WAS US$ 200.8 MILLION​
* QTRLY LOSS PER SHARE 2.60 US CENTS‍​ * BELIEVES CO TO HAVE ADEQUATE FINANCIAL RESOURCES TO CONTINUE IN OPERATION FOR A PERIOD OF AT LEAST TWELVE MONTHS‍​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
